bb file
-----------
**need ten lines header**
10th line contains run information
11th line contains number of wavelengths & those wavelengths
12th line onwards contains ac data
ac data takes form of:
depth then bb for each wavelength
(NB - HE6 recognises end of data by negative depth)
[1.0, 10.0, 0.01]
71 400 405 410 415 420 425 430 435 440 445 450 455 460 465 470 475 480 485 490 495 500 505 510 515 520 525 530 535 540 545 550 555 560 565 570 575 580 585 590 595 600 605 610 615 620 625 630 635 640 645 650 655 660 665 670 675 680 685 690 695 700 705 710 715 720 725 730 735 740 745 750
